text: Betrayed by a Handprint is a 1908 American silent crime movie directed by D. W. GriffithBetrayed by a HandprintIra H. Gallen. D.W. Griffith: Master of Cinema and stars Florence Lawrence, Harry Solter, and Linda Arvidson. ==Actors== * Florence Lawrence as Myrtle Vane * Harry Solter as Mr. Wharton * Linda Arvidson as The Maid / Party Guest * Kate Bruce as Mrs. Wharton (unconfirmed) * Gene Gauntier as Party Guest * George Gebhardt as The Palmister * Mack Sennett as The Butler ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 movies Category:1900s crime movies Category:American crime movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Betrayed by a Handprint
